artifacts.description: Twice-daily doorstep scan protocol with 2-minute checklist, cadence windows, and action-tip rules.
Initialized 2026-03-01 doorstep scan log entry with three conservative action tips and explicit unknown-confidence marker.

summary: Advanced task task-20260301-001 by operationalizing a twice-daily doorstep scan workflow and recording today’s initialization scan with concrete action tips while preserving evidence integrity. Verification evidence: `imagesnap -l` => No video devices found; `ls -la devices/66f110fc-de9e-4d7e-9e4b-5b6da61f4c76/runtime/doorstep_scan` => created `protocol.md` and `scan_log_2026-03-01.ndjson`; `python3` log validator => `doorstep_scan_log_valid rows=1 tips=3 confidence=unknown`; `PYTHONPATH=src python3` contract validation => `worker_result_schema_valid`. This cycle cannot claim machine-observed doorstep conditions because no local video device is available, so the task remains IN_PROGRESS pending morning/evening physical doorway observations.

task_updates.note: Created a documented twice-daily doorstep scan protocol and initialized today’s scan log with three conservative action tips. Machine-observed doorstep sensing is unavailable this cycle (`imagesnap -l`: No video devices found), so next scans should capture human-observed conditions during the morning/evening windows to replace unknown fields.
